Text: Thanx so much!! got anymore glee in flac???

Not at the moment, but I can pull individual tracks. I'm thinking the "Anything Goes/Anything You Can Do" and "Pretty/Unpretty" mashups deserve to get flac'd. Glee is at its best when its pretty. (I don't anyone needs "Fat Bottom Girls" in full fidelity.)

Youre absolutely right! yes i have glee the music vol 6 in flac, but thats the only one, i was thinking most of "i believe i can fly/fly" mix, it just wasnt so smooth in mp3. Totally agree on Pretty/Unpretty!
